content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal mine at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position unknown)

### Iron plate factory at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unknown)
- Inserter (position unknown) that puts into assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory to craft the desired item. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plate, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting without required machines
- Ensure you are using the correct crafting machine or furnace for the item you are trying to craft. For example, iron-plate cannot be crafted without a furnace or crafting machine.
